content: The headstone of Sgt. Leonard Matlovich (1943-1988), a decorated Vietnam War veteran who was later dishonorably discharged after military investigators learned of his sexual orientation. He is buried in the Congressional Cemetery.
reply: The headstone of Sgt. Leonard Matlovich (1943-1988), a decorated Vietnam War veteran who was later dishonorably discharged after military investigators learned of his sexual orientation. He is buried in the Congressional Cemetery.
title: DADT:  This says it all.

content: Sorry, but I can't see that it says all that much. Those of us who served in combat knew that we'd be called upon to dispatch our enemy. And, we knew what the rules were about prohibited relationships.
reply: Sorry, but I can't see that it says all that much. Those of us who served in combat knew that we'd be called upon to dispatch our enemy. And, we knew what the rules were about prohibited relationships.
title: DADT:  This says it all.
